name: Cautious Fighter
text: You care more about survival than victory.
benefit: When fighting defensively or using total defense, your dodge bonus to AC increases by 2.
staminaText: When not fighting defensively or using total defense, you can spend 5 stamina points to increase your dodge bonus by 2. This increase lasts until the start of your next turn.
text_zh: 比起胜利你更注重生存。
benefit_zh: 当你使用防御式战斗或者完全防御时，你获得的AC闪避加值额外+2。
staminaText_zh: 如果你不在防御式战斗或全力防御，通过花费5点耐力可以使你的闪避AC+2，直至你的下一轮开始。
